name: Beleza Coffee Bar
summary: Probably the best espresso in Boulder
food: Wide variety of healthy and tasty option ready to go or from the kitchen
socializing: Lively and cozy but often hard to find seating
working: Crowded but it can be nice to have the energy around as long as you don't have to take a private or quiet call. Nice food options make it easy to easy to stay put for most of a workday.
